Package co.acoustic.mobile.push.sdk.api.registration

Interface RegistrationClient

All Known Implementing Classes:
RegistrationClientImpl
public interface RegistrationClient
This interface is for the sdk registration client implementation

  • Method Details

    • start

      void start(android.content.Context context, MceSdkConfiguration mceSdkConfiguration)
      This method should be called on when the activity's onStart method is called. The method initializes the sdk if this is the first time it is called and updates it if it isn't.
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context.
      mceSdkConfiguration - The mce sdk configuration

    • getAppKey

      String getAppKey(android.content.Context context)
      Returns MCE application key.
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context.
      Returns:
      The application key

    • getRegistrationDetails

      RegistrationDetails getRegistrationDetails(android.content.Context context)
      Returns the sdk's registration details
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context.
      Returns:
      The registration details object
      See Also:
      • RegistrationDetails

    • isSdkInitiated

      boolean isSdkInitiated(android.content.Context context)
      Checks if the SDK's init process was previously called.
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context
      Returns:
      true if sdk init process was called, false otherwise

    • getSdkState

      SdkState getSdkState(android.content.Context context)
      retrieves the current state of the sdk
      Parameters:
      context - The application's context
      Returns:
      The sdk current state
